changes.change: Fixed Safari crashing when loading YouTube for users of iOS prior to 9.xB
Fixed Vimeo videos no longer downloading following Vimeo site API change.
Added support for downloading videos from the Chinese video website “Youku.com”.
Youku support includes downloading multi parts videos in one go.
Fixed Youtube videos no longer downloading following Youtube API change.
Fixed the issue which causes searching for album artwork to yield only low resolution images.
